channel.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
channel.description: I just got the crossbow and am almost out of the ichthyosaur area I believe. However there's a sparking wire going off on the only gap in the steel fence I can find. I just can't seem to figure out a way past it or how to turn it off. Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: gapagos
item.description:
Try to stick around closed places where they can only come from one direction, and shotgun 'em. Works best if you can convince them to attempt to “escape” to a dead-end zone. Works like wonder. Stay far away from open places with lots of escape routes.

(Note: I am playing on Hard, and I fount them easy, as long as I used my shotgun in tight places and never waited for them in large rooms)

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: GordonReturns
item.description:
I waited by the dead guard until one came towards me, then I blasted her with the shotgun. I then ran around the corner and went into an area where I could close the door on one side and set up trip mines and also explosive barrels. Love having a wall at your back.

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: dky.tehkingd.u
item.description:
MP5 grenades. Or also the Magnum and Crossbow if you’re a crack shot.

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
crossbow instagibs them

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: rudger
item.description:
TBH I had no trouble at all with the crossbow - there´s this corridor before you enter the hangar, standing in the middle of the corridor facing the door out, I zoomed in and pulled the trigger as soon as I saw something flickering, got 2 of them in a few minutes, I had to run out to lure the third, ran back to corridor, waited, bam - I know, cheap shot

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Splaterson
item.description:
You only need to put 3 barrels under it and crouch jump to the next platform.

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: dev02ify
item.description:
Eh… I couldn’t get the bridge to float so I just stacked some barrels and jumped over.

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Heisenberg
item.description:
I have 9 barrels under the the bridge and its already moved up and its so close to being able to make but i just cant make the jump.

EDIT: ERRMERGURD I REMOVED LIKE 2 BARRELS THEN I MADE THE JUMP. WEIRD!

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Eltripas
item.description:
Has the bridge already moved?, for me it just moved once and that was enough to get to the other side, I used a crouch jump and had to run, it is not an easy jump, mind you.

Also I read somewhere else that the put a box on the edge and that helped them, I didn’t tried that so I don’t know if this works.

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Heisenberg
item.description:
Okay so i found every single barrel that i need to raise the bridge looked in every single hole in every room under water Etc. There are no barrels left. is there something else i need to do im stuck here and have been for the better part of an hour or more.

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Eltripas
item.description:
Heh, the ability to hold things give some space to get some lateral solutions of the puzzles in the game.

Read full topic

item.description:
ya, I tried that many times with no luck heh

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
Yeah, it took me a minute to see that, too. It’s to the right of the wire and it’s on the fence. Jump through the tiny hole.

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection

item.description:
well I just made it with the help of a pallet, I was able to knock the “wires” away lol

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Eltripas
item.description:
wesjr:

Maybe I am blind but I am not seeing any way around this.

I am in the water area, there is an opening with a “live” wire and it says
“Generator room” on the other side.

There is a hole in the fence crouch jump through there, you need to run.

Read full topic

I am in the water area, there is an opening with a “live” wire and it says

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: NefariousJoe
item.description:
Yeah, this one got me too. You’re looking in the immediate area and the rooms around for red barrels to place in the cage underneath the broken bridge thingy. Once you have enough (I think there’s three to find), it’ll raise the broken platform enough for you to jump across.

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: FERGUS
item.description:
The truck doesn’t block the passage, keep swimming.

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Valo
item.description:
I think you need to look on the other side of the wall that’s in the middle of the pit, when you pass the dead soldier on the staircase, you come out just above water level, turn right and walk/jump on a catwalk which will collapse under your weight.

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: X_Mastershot_X
item.description:
lucifer579:

I killed them all with the MP5, easy as fuck…
But I’m not playing on hard. I play on normal.

Shoot anything that seems like it’s moving man. Bitches jump weirdly and escape my grenades.

EDIT: God I’m already dying for Xen. Gonarch and Nihilanth are gonna be epic battles.

Read full topic

item.description:
I killed them all with the MP5, easy as fuck…

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Phoenixrider
item.description:
I got stuck at apprehension. After bulding the bridge with air barrels I passed to the other side and the place suddenly collapsed. Now I’m in water again. There are stairs but I can’t reach them. There is a second level up but I can’t reach that either. There are crack in the wall that I can’t get through but I can see the tram on the other side so I’m in the room next door I think. There is an under water passage but a truck blocks that one. I hope you understood where I am. How do I get out of here? I tried to hoard flooting items to try to reach somewhere but nothing…

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: PlausibleSarge
item.description:
yeah I always save all of my tripmines for the 2 ninja rooms

Read full topic

item.title: Apprehension: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: X_Mastershot_X
item.description:
Got them with 3 health left. Had no smg grenade, health, suit or mines. 1 satchel only. Now i must not get bitten by a headcrab until I finds some health in residue processing.

I am no longer wasting my explosives lol

Read full topic
